memberdef.name: AttcPrepareWriteReq

briefdescription.para: Initiate an attribute protocol Prepare Write Request.

parameterdescription.para: Write attribute data starting at this offset.
true if pValue data is accessed by reference rather than copied.
true if ATTC continues sending requests until complete.

briefdescription.para: Initiate an attribute protocol Execute Write Request.

parameterdescription.para: true to write all queued writes, false to cancel all queued writes.

briefdescription.para: Cancel an attribute protocol request in progress.
This utility function discovers the given service on a peer device. Function AttcFindByTypeValueReq() is called to initiate the discovery procedure.

This utility function discovers the given service on a peer device starting from the last handle in the previous discovery. Function AttcFindByTypeValueReq() is called to initiate the discovery procedure.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to service discovery control block.

memberdef.argsstring: (dmConnId_t connId, attcDiscCb_t *pCb, uint8_t uuidLen, uint8_t *pUuid, uint16_t offsetHdl)
memberdef.name: AttcDiscServiceFromOffset

briefdescription.para: This utility function discovers the given service on a peer device. Function AttcFindByTypeValueReq() is called to initiate the discovery procedure.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to service discovery control block.
The starting handle to search from.

briefdescription.para: This utility function processes a service discovery result. It should be called when an ATTC_FIND_BY_TYPE_VALUE_RSP callback event is received after service discovery is initiated by calling AttcDiscService().

This utility function starts characteristic and characteristic descriptor discovery for a service on a peer device. The service must have been previously discovered by calling AttcDiscService() and AttcDiscServiceCmpl().

This utility function processes a characteristic discovery result. It should be called when an ATTC_READ_BY_TYPE_RSP or ATTC_FIND_INFO_RSP callback event is received after characteristic discovery is initiated by calling AttcDiscCharStart().

simplesect.para: ATT_CONTINUING if successful and the discovery procedure is continuing. ATT_SUCCESS if the discovery procedure completed successfully. Otherwise the discovery procedure failed.

briefdescription.para: This utility function starts service include discovery for a service on a peer device. The service must have been previously discovered by calling AttcDiscService() and AttcDiscServiceCmpl().

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to service discovery control block.

briefdescription.para: This utility function processes a service include discovery result. It should be called when an ATTC_READ_BY_TYPE_RSP allback event is received after service include discovery is initiated by calling AttcDiscIncSvcStart().

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to service discovery control block.

simplesect.para: ATT_CONTINUING if successful and discovery procedure is continuing. ATT_SUCCESS if discovery procedure completed successfully. Otherwise the discovery procedure failed.

briefdescription.para: This utility function starts characteristic configuration for characteristics on a peer device. The characteristics must have been previously discovered by calling AttcDiscCharStart() and AttcDiscCharCmpl().

simplesect.para: ATT_CONTINUING if successful and configuration procedure is continuing. ATT_SUCCESS if nothing to configure.

briefdescription.para: This utility function initiates the next characteristic configuration procedure. It should be called when an ATTC_READ_RSP or ATTC_WRITE_RSP callback event is received after characteristic configuration is initiated by calling AttcDiscConfigStart().

simplesect.para: ATT_CONTINUING if successful and configuration procedure is continuing. ATT_SUCCESS if configuration procedure completed successfully.

briefdescription.para: This utility function resumes the characteristic configuration procedure. It can be called when an ATTC_READ_RSP or ATTC_WRITE_RSP callback event is received with failure status to attempt the read or write procedure again.

simplesect.para: ATT_CONTINUING if successful and configuration procedure is continuing. ATT_SUCCESS if configuration procedure completed successfully.

briefdescription.para: Initiate an attribute protocol Exchange MTU Request.

simplesect.para: The Exchange MTU Request will be initiated automatically on a master connection.
This API can be used by the application to initiate an Exchange MTU Request on slave connections.

briefdescription.para: Set automatic Indication Confirmations sent from this ATT Client.

parameterdescription.para: true to enable automatic confirmations (default), false to disable.

briefdescription.para: Send an attribute protocol indication confirmation.

memberdef.argsstring: (dmConnId_t connId, uint8_t priority, uint16_t startHandle, uint16_t endHandle, bool continuing)

briefdescription.para: Initialize the Enhanced ATT Client.

simplesect.para: EattInit must be called after the ATT task is created and before calling EattsInit and/or EattcInit.

sectiondef.header: ATT Client Discovery and Configuration Settings

description.para: Settings used to configurate ATT Discovery procedure for ATT Clients.

detaileddescription.para: Set if the UUID is 128 bits in length
Set if characteristic must be discovered
Set if this is a characteristic descriptor
